summary: manchester city host barcelona at the etihad stadium on tuesday night .   barca beat manuel pellegrini 's side 2-0 in first leg last season .   lionel messi , neymar and luis suarez form a fearsome front three .   sergio aguero could be returning to form at the right time for city .   yaya toure is suspended for the first leg and fernandinho must fill the void .
